org.mt4j.input
Interface IMTInputEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractComponentProcessor, AbstractCursorProcessor, AbstractShape, AbstractVisibleComponent, ArcballProcessor, BitmapFontCharacter, Cluster, ComponentInputProcessorSupport, DragProcessor, FiducialScene, LassoProcessor, MTBackgroundImage, MTCanvas, MTClipRectangle, MTClipRoundRect, MTColorPicker, MTComplexPolygon, MTComponent, MTCube, MTEllipse, MTImage, MTImageButton, MTKey, MTKeyboard, MTLine, MTList, MTListCell, MTMovieClip, MTOverlayContainer, MTPolygon, MTProgressBar, MTRectangle, MTRoundRectangle, MTSceneMenu, MTSceneTexture, MTSceneWindow, MTSlider, MTSphere, MTStencilPolygon, MTSvg, MTSvgButton, MTTextArea, MTTextField, MTTextKeyboard, MTTriangleMesh, MTVideoTexture, MTWindow, MultipleDragProcessor, PanProcessorTwoFingers, PhysicsCircle, PhysicsPolygon, PhysicsRectangle, PhysicsSphere, RotateProcessor, ScaleProcessor, TapAndHoldProcessor, TapProcessor, TouchTailComponent, VectorFontCharacter, ZoomProcessor
public interface IMTInputEventListener

The listener interface for receiving IMTInputEvent events. The class that is interested in processing a IMTInputEvent event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addIMTInputEventListener method. When the IMTInputEvent event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.

Author:
Christopher Ruff
See Also:
MTInputEvent
